=== QtSystemInfo ===

This test plan is for xenial

'''Testing QInputInfo''' Used in convergence.

* Install qtsystems5-examples package
* From commandline, run /userdata/user-data/phablet/qtsystems-opensource-src-5.0~git20141206~44f70d99/examples/systeminfo/inputinfo/inputinfo

* Test that it shows current amount of keyboard, touchscreens, mouse inputs
* attach bluetooth keyboard and/or mouse
* Test that devices appear in command.
* remove bluetooth keyboard and/or mouse
* Test that devices are removed in command.

or alternatively, run the qml example app:
/userdata/user-data/phablet/qtsystems-opensource-src-5.0~git20141206~44f70d99/examples/systeminfo/qml-inputinfo/qml-inputinfo --desktop_file_hint=/usr/share/applications/address-book-app.desktop

and do the same procedure.
